post:
Hello LES'ers,

Celebrate India's 75th Independence Day with our special deals.

We are thrilled to offer everything at just $1 applicable on Domains, Web Hosting, Reseller Hosting - Limited to 75 different users.

**Domain Deal**:
Get the industry's standard .COM domain @ $1 for 1 year.
_Coupon: DOM75IN_
PS: Domains Limited to 5 Stocks, Whois Protection will be excluded and applicable to 1 year only. (1 domain per user).
URL: https://www.hivalidity.com/domain-search

**Web Hosting**: 
Enjoy lightning-fast managed Google Cloud Hosting @ $1 for 3 months.
_Coupon: WEB75IN_
PS: Web Hosting Limited to 35 Stocks and applicable to EverCloud Plan only. (1 hosting per user).
URL: https://www.hivalidity.com/web-hosting

**Reseller Hosting**:
Get Reseller Hosting powered by Google Cloud @ $1 for 3 months.
_Coupon: RES75IN_
PS: Reseller Hosting Limited to 35 Stocks, applicable to JumpStart Plan only and free WHMCS license will be excluded. (1 reseller per user).
URL: https://www.hivalidity.com/reseller-hosting

**Alert**: This offer is only for 75 different users, and all orders will be approved manually after verification. If we found suspicious multiple sign-ups for any user, we'll cancel his/her all orders.

**SHARE YOUR ORDER NUMBER ON THE COMMENT, SO WE CAN UNDERSTAND YOU DIDN'T SIGNUP MULTIPLE TIMES!**
